[Castle Facilities Management]
NameExperience Value Recovery Facility
Cost%AgitDecoCost%
Use When Blood Alliance members are resurrected in the castle, their experience value is %AgitDecoEffect%restored.

You must pay in advance to use this facility.
The first usage fee is deducted from the inventory of the clan lord; subsequent fees are automatically withdrawn from the clan warehouse.
If there is not sufficient Adena in the clan warehouse to pay the fee, the facility is reset.
